name: LINER In-Site
author: LINER

sections.description:
LINER In-Site makes your website ‘highlight-able’.
Visitors will be able to highlight on your website and share highlighted link with others.

Major features in LINER In-Site includes:
* Highlight your blog or web page.
* Share highlighted web page to your friends via Facebook, Twitter, and Permalink
PS: Please subscribe your email on our website(https://connect.getliner.com/api/in-site) and receive further updates and changes.
sections.installation:
Upload the LINER In-Site plugin on your WordPress website and activate it.
1, 2, 3: You’re done!

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Upload the LINER In-Site plugin on your WordPress website and activate it.
1, 2, 3: You’re done!

short_description: LINER helps you highlight sentences on the web. Highlight your favorite texts.
